triplets: Heat exchanger that radiates thermal energy to warm a space
Heating rooms, drying clothes, and part of central heating systems
Cast iron, steel, aluminum, or copper with water/steam passages
Fins, valves, pipes, brackets, and sometimes thermostat controls
Heating systems, buildings, and HVAC infrastructure
Heating equipment companies like Runtal, Zehnder, etc.
Approximately 50–80 cm for standard residential radiators
Approximately 15–50 kg depending on material and size
